articles.description: Seth Rogen has signed on to play the 'favorite uncle' of renowned director Steven Spielberg in a new film about his childhood.
articles.content:
Seth Rogen has signed on to play the 'favorite uncle' of renowned director Steven Spielberg in a new film about his childhood.
